content: 5 row 1 3 5 7 9 k to last 5 sts sps yo k2 row 2 4 6 8 10 12 k2 p to last 2 sts k2 row 11 k2 *yo k2tog* repeat from *to* 6 times k to last 5 sts sps yo k2 move onto next section decrease section 6 row 1 3 5 7 9 11 k to last 5 sts sps yo k2 row 2 4 6 8 10 12 k2 p to last 2 sts k2 work decrease section 6 until 8 sts remain then decrease as follows row 1 k2 ssk k2tog k2 row 2 k1 k2tog k2tog k1 row 3 knit row 5 k2tog k2tog after row 5 slip the second stitch over the first stitch on left hand needle and pull yarn through block shawl with pins or blocking wires to desired size and let dry pattern questions can be directed to witchinghourknits@gmail com this pattern is for personal use and not to be re-distributed © dora violet
